code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import{CALENDER_VIEW}from'../../constants';import{months}from'../../constants/index';import{calenderContext}from'../../Context/calender.context';import{Flexbox}from'../../elements/Flexbox';import*as H from'./style';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CalenderLayout=_ref=>{let{children,handleActionProcced,handleActionBack}=_ref;const contextTesting=useContext(calenderContext);const{state,dispatch}=contextTesting;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(H.Container,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Flexbox,{className:"card-top",flexRow:true,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{style:{fontSize:20},color:"white",children:["Events schedule ",months[state.month-1]," ",state.year]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Flexbox,{flexRow:true,className:"card-top-inner",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Flexbox,{justifyCenter:true,alignCenter:true,className:"card-top-inner-item",onClick:()=>dispatch(handleActionBack),children:"P"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Flexbox,{justifyCenter:true,alignCenter:true,className:`card-top-inner-item ${state.index!==CALENDER_VIEW&&'card-top-inner-item__disabled'}`,onClick:()=>dispatch(handleActionProcced),children:"N"})]})]}),children]});};export default CalenderLayout;
